subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: In his American season debut at the Honda Classic, McIlroy finished three strokes outside the projected cut line on Friday. But Brooks Koepka, a Palm Beach County native, had the low round of the day.
snippet: In his American season debut at the Honda Classic, McIlroy finished three strokes outside the projected cut line on Friday. But Brooks Koepka, a Palm Beach County native, had the low round of the day.
